official_title: To designate Homestead Air Force Base, Florida, and the county within which the military installation is located, as an enterprise zone for purposes of title VII of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987.

summary.text: Designates Homestead Air Force Base, Florida, and a specified portion of Dade County, Florida, as an additional enterprise zone for purposes of title VII of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987.
